sections.title: Introduction (Wide Shot)
sections.content: Hey everyone! Welcome back to the channel. Today, I'm going to show you a quick and easy way to generate Solana keypairs and derive public keys from seed phrases using Python. Let's dive right in!

sections.title: Enter Seed Phrase (Wide Shot)
sections.content: When prompted, enter your seed phrase. The script will generate a new keypair and display the public key. It will also derive a public key from your seed phrase and save it to a JSON file.
sections.code:
Please enter your seed phrase: your-seed-phrase-here
Public Key: <generated-public-key>
Derived Public Key: <derived-public-key>
Wallet JSON file 'my-solana-wallet.json' created.

sections.title: Exploring the Output (Close Shot)
sections.content: Let's open the JSON file to see the derived public key. Check out the `my-solana-wallet.json` file for your derived public key.

sections.title: Conclusion (Wide Shot)
sections.content: And that's it! You've generated a Solana keypair and derived a public key. If you found this helpful, smash that like button and subscribe for more quick tutorials. Got questions? Drop them in the comments below. Thanks for watching!
